faq.title: Common Questions
faq.subtitle: What travelers ask before using TRAVI
faq.whatIsTravi: What kind of information does TRAVI provide?
faq.whatIsTraviAnswer: TRAVI gives you the practical details you need: opening hours, ticket prices, how to get there, best times to visit, and insider tips. We cover 3,000+ attractions across 17 destinations including Dubai, Paris, Tokyo, and more.
faq.howManyDestinationsAnswer: Dubai, Paris, Tokyo, New York, Barcelona, Singapore, London, Bangkok, Abu Dhabi, Amsterdam, Hong Kong, Istanbul, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, and Rome. We add more destinations regularly.
faq.isFree: Is there a cost to use TRAVI?
faq.isFreeAnswer: TRAVI is completely free. No subscriptions, no paywalls. We earn a small commission when you book tickets through our partner links, but our recommendations are based on what's actually worth visiting.
faq.updateFrequencyAnswer: We update our content daily. Opening hours, prices, and seasonal information are verified regularly so you can plan with confidence.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about TRAVI destination guides
faq.q1: How many destinations does TRAVI cover?
faq.a1: TRAVI covers major travel destinations across the Middle East, Europe, Asia, and Americas with comprehensive guides for each location.
faq.q2: What information is included in TRAVI destination guides?
faq.a2: Each destination guide includes detailed descriptions covering attractions, accommodation options, local cuisine, transportation tips, and practical travel information.
faq.a3: Yes, TRAVI allows searching destinations by name or country using the search bar on the destinations page.
faq.q4: What are the featured destinations on TRAVI?
faq.a4: TRAVI's featured destinations are handpicked locations offering exceptional experiences for travelers with diverse interests from luxury to budget travel.
